sub_title: Certified SAP S4 Hana Consultant (Sourcing and Procurement/P2P/MM/Logistics/Master Data) || Senior Manager (Client Delivery) || GEP
summary:
Email: nikhil.c.vichare@gmail.com / vichare.nikhil2811@gmail.com

Experienced Certified SAP Business Process Consultant with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Operations Management, Supply Chain Management and SAP. Strong consulting professional with a Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.) focused in Operations Management from K.J. Somaiya Institute of Management Studies and Research. 

•	Overall 12 years of IT experience majorly in SAP consulting. Experienced with International as well as national clients at offshore and client site.
•	Experience in SAP MM, Procure to Pay (P2P), Sourcing and Procurement and MDG/MDM involves working on implementation, roll out and support projects (having integration with SD/FI/WM/LE modules) with global organizations. It involves exposure to client first meet, program management and stake holder management, oversee the execution of project delivery, conducting workshops and demos for new solution proposal, responding RFPs and appearing for orals. 
•	It also involves rich experience in various project phases such as project kick off, blueprint, design and configuration, testing, cutover, go live and hyper-care. 
•	Hands on experience in customization of business processes such as standard as well as special procurement, setting up master data, creating LSMW tools and working on Idocs.
•	The work also covers the fit GAP analysis, ASIS & TOBE processes, BPR studies, and flow chart documentation, presentation to the management team and time & job scheduling.
•	Responsible for planning and executing SAP Implementation / Development / Support activities regard to SAP – Material Management and ability to Lead the team
•	Support change management and conduct end user testing 
•	Experience of working as Lead to handle team of size 5 people in Master Data module.
•	Hands on experience of preparing business process flow designs with tools such as  MS - VISIO and presented during various sessions including POC.
•	Hands on exposure in sub-modules such as LE and WM
•	Ability to analyze functional and technical needs and identify gaps and alternative solutions relative to existing design.
•	Experience with preparing functional specifications, test documentation, reports, test scripts and providing user training.
•	Ability to create presentation/workshop material for Blueprint that need to be conveyed and be 
able to present them to the client.
•	SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP S/4HANA Sourcing and Procurement Upskilling for SAP ERP Experts

profile_positions.description:
	A client facing role conducting Cross-impact analysis, Stakeholder management, FIT GAP sessions, Product demo for GEP NEXXE – Supply Chain Solution implementation project
	Process owner for Direct Procurement, Subcontracting (CMO process) and Consignment
	Working with Client stakeholders and GEP internal Product teams to get alignment on implementation roadmap
	Translating client business requirements to internal Product team and ensuring that the product/service is delivered to client per the requirements in a timely manner   
	Understanding gaps and recommeding process improvements to be incorporated in global design
	Documenting client presentations for design, blueprint and product functionality 
	Agile way of implementation spanning over 2 years covering the regions across Eurpe and APAC 
	Appreciation: 
	For driving and closing key design discussions and stake holder management
profile_positions.title: Manager

profile_positions.description:
	Conducting Cross-impact analysis, Stakeholder management, Capacity Planning and Change Management across multiple projects
	Conducting Joint requirements sessions with business and IT stakeholders for P2P/CPPU and Channel Finance Business lines
	Supporting S/4 Hana Migration program for P2P cycle as an inhouse consultant 
	Vendor management: Lead CR management (6 CRs in total – 2 for RBI moratorium and 4 to reduce customer complaints) and support discussion 
	Responsible to organize TCL side on any project matter required 
	Vendor management: Lead CR management and support discussion
	Challenge vendor on approach/timing/budget when necessary 
	Lead all SteerCo reviews and discussions on the project.
	Translate business process requirements into SAP ECC 6.0 (MM) technical designs.
	Strong Stakeholder management
	Drive continuous process improvement
	Keeping a professional and collaborative relationship with business representatives of the respective functions.
	Mitigate business risk and deliver a positive user experience.
	Strategic planning, design, development and rollout of the information systems and related processes.
	Monitor and account for IT expenditure.
	Vendor assessment and onboarding 
	Primary contact from TCL IT team for audit responses and periodic review
	Appreciation: 
o	For driving automation in supplier code creation process to save 12 Lacs per year for the organization
o	For leading and driving compliance activity to ensure zero gaps in external and internal audit activity and setting up strong governance framework to ensure continuity in adherence to the compliance
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager - Information Technology

profile_positions.description:
	Involved in the planning, conceptual design, configuration, prototype presentation, testing and documentation of user manuals of Procurement module. Played key role as a member of the team interacting with the process owners, top management and users.
	Strong knowledge of procure to pay cycle covering critical aspects of Purchasing, Inventory Management and Invoice Verification
	Thorough understanding of special procurement processes such as subcontracting and consignment
	Understand the Business process of goods procurement to customer sale. The as is and to be scenario presentation and solution design
	Translate business controls requirements into SAP ECC 6.0 (MM) technical designs.
	Experience in reviewing MM configurations done in SPRO to identify and validate the completeness and effectiveness of controls configuration 
	Involved in solution designing, conducted SIT and executed UAT with the help of stake holders
	Configuration of new plant, shipping point, route determination technique and condition records.
	Coordinated with multiple vendors from geographically distributed teams for a successful development, testing and deployment of a single project

Master Data Team Lead
	Interact with business user and receive raw data for master data objects. Process the data using data cleansing techniques, transform the data into load format and upload the data.
	Interact with different teams to understand the scope of stream specific objects to be load
	Create the data upload tool for stream specific objects using LSMW and upload the data
	Resolve issues such as data duplication, errors in upload tool
	Own end to end responsibility of Master data upload with 100 percent efficiency and accuracy
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Master Data Consultant

 Working on Supply Chain module along with Master Data Administration module

 Well versed with Master data upload via LSMW tools

 Master data cleansing, validating and set-up

 Responsibilities include requirement gathering, preparing and executing test cases of SIT and UAT

 Exposure to Go live, Cut over and Hyper-care support activities

 Handling P1 to P3 level tickets and maintaining SLA to ensure resolution of the issue in time.

Analysis of Incident monitoring reports and assuring reduction in the open issues

 Actively involved in Key User Training and Handover activities as well as documentation
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
During a pivotal point in my professional journey, I made a conscious decision to embark on a career break, driven by my unwavering aspiration to contribute to the vision of building the "Steel Frame of India." Throughout this period, I challenged myself by undertaking one of the most demanding examinations in the world.

This rigorous endeavor demanded a comprehensive understanding of diverse subjects, encompassing history, geography, civics, environment science, economics, and more. I committed myself to the pursuit of updated knowledge across various streams of general studies, ensuring that I was well-equipped to tackle any challenge that came my way.

A significant aspect of the preparation process involved staying abreast of the latest developments, issues, and events that could profoundly impact our nation's trajectory. This continuous pursuit of knowledge not only broadened my intellectual horizons but also nurtured a deep sense of awareness about the critical issues that shape public life.

As a result, this transformative journey has not only enriched me with a wealth of knowledge but also empowered me to form well-informed opinions on matters of national importance.
profile_positions.title: UPSC Civil Service exam aspirant

profile_positions.description:
SAP MM Consultant 
	Trained in SAP-MM (Materials Management) module in Infosys. Have considerable knowledge about the procurement cycle and configuration part for MM module
	One and half years of functional consulting experience in SAP MM and SD module with touch points in WM and FICO
	Involved in 1 ETE implementation projects with International Client.
	Worked as shadow resource in support project
	Extensive experience in client interactions, requirement gathering and testing (SIT and UAT)
	Worked on different types of projects such as end to end projects, development projects, enhancement projects and support projects
	MM-Purchasing/Procurement: Hands on experience in configuring Material Master, Vendor Master, Partner schema, Purchase requisition, Purchases order and pricing schema
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate Consultant

profile_positions.description:
	Mainframes developer in TCS with around 3 years of professional experience in Coding, Testing & Enhancement in various domains such as Travelling and Hospitality, Manufacturing , banking and finance under International and National projects.
	Around 1.5 years of extensive experience in working at client site. The responsibilities include interacting with client, understanding client requirements, providing estimations for enhancements, system and unit testing for new code development, working in mock disaster recoveries. 
	Single point of contact for a module, played important role in optimizing and automating number of client business processes in order to achieve higher efficiency, reduce down time and improve overall output of system.
	Implemented major enhancements in order to incorporate changes in business working as per governmental regulations with least affect to existing business activities.
